text: Franz-Josef Rehrl (born 15 March 1993) is an Austrian nordic combined skier who competes internationally.FIS profile He competed at the 2018 Winter Olympics. His first podium in an World Cup race came on 30 November 2018, when he finished third at Lillehammer. His first win came in the same season, in Chaux-Neuve. ==Record== ===World Championship=== {| class="wikitable" "text- align:center;" ! Year ! Individual NH ! Individual LH ! Team NH !
